Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Preserve compatibility between 1.0 shim (no private data) and 1.1 shim (private data)
Issue.description: If shim does not get automatically upgraded in 1.1 (see FAB-5676), then we will need to preserve the old 1.0 shim proto messages and create a duplicate set of proto messages for chaincode functions using private data.
